"This will explain Status Ailments.

A change in your status, called a status ailment, can occur when either an individual or hostile is hit during an attack. "

"For example: If a character is under the effect of 'Burn'; that player will be on fire and will take damage over time for a set period. On top of that, Burn can spread to other players if they are touching.

Other Status Effects include 'Freeze', 'Shock', 'Mirage', 'Panic', and 'Poison'."
"Generally, status ailments are automatically removed after a certain amount of time has passed. The item, 'Sol Atomizer' can quickly restore you and your allies to health. "
